mapper.select: WITH DD AS ( SELECT EVENT_ID, EVENT_NM, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_HOST_ID ,EVENT_CODE /*2022.11.17 kjy */ ,EVENT_PATH /*2022.11.21 kjy */ FROM TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW PRI WHERE ORG_ID = #{orgId} AND EVENT_CODE = #{eventCode} AND EVENT_FINAL_FLAG = 'Y' AND EVENT_TP ='A' AND EVENT_STATUS = 'A' AND SYSDATE() BETWEEN EVENT_START_DATE AND EVENT_END_DATE AND DATA_END_STATUS IS NULL /*2022.11.08 kjy */ UNION SELECT EVENT_ID, EVENT_NM, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_HOST_ID ,EVENT_CODE /*2022.11.17 kjy */ ,EVENT_PATH /*2022.11.21 kjy */ FROM TB_S020.EVENT_HIERARCHY_VIEW PRI WHERE ORG_ID = #{orgId} AND EVENT_FINAL_FLAG = 'Y' AND EVENT_TP ='A' AND EVENT_STATUS = 'A' AND SYSDATE() BETWEEN EVENT_START_DATE AND EVENT_END_DATE AND LEV = 0 AND DATA_END_STATUS IS NULL /*2022.11.08 kjy */ ) SELECT EVENT_ID, -- EVENT_ID EVENT_CODE, /*2022.11.17 kjy */ EVENT_NM, /*행사명*/ EVENT_START_DATE, /*행사시작일자*/ EVENT_END_DATE, /*행사종료일자*/ EVENT_HOST_ID, /*책임자id*/ (SELECT M010.MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 M010 WHERE EVENT_HOST_ID = M010.MEMBER_ID) AS EVENT_HOST_NAME /*책임자명*/ ,EVENT_PATH /*2022.11.21 kjy */ FROM DD ORDER BY EVENT_ID DESC LIMIT 4

select m010.member_id, m010.member_name, m010.hp_no, m010.mobile_id, m010.mobile_login_date, CONCAT(org010.org_name, '@', e010.event_id, '@', e010.event_nm) as org_event_name, e010.event_id, org010.org_id, e010.event_code, m010.member_tp, e010.event_nm, org010.org_name, (select ifnull( concat(e020.event_pay_level, '차결제자'), ifnull(event_pay_role_cd, '일반회원')) from tb_s020.tb_s020_event020 e020 where e020.event_id = e010.event_id and e020.event_pay_user_id = m010.member_id) as event_role, (select e010_1.event_id from tb_s020.tb_s020_event010 e010_1 where e010_1.org_id = e010.org_id and default_event_flag = 'Y') default_event_id /*2022.11.01 kjy add */ ,(select USE_REG_FLAG from tb_s020.tb_s020_event020 where event_id = e010.event_id and event_pay_user_id = m010.member_id) as USE_REG_FLAG
from tb_s020.tb_s020_event010 e010 inner join tb_s020.tb_s020_org010 org010 on org010.org_id = e010.org_id inner join tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 m010 on org010.org_id = m010.org_id where e010.event_code = #{eventCode} and m010.hp_no = #{hpNo}

select count(e030.EVENT_USE_ID) cnt, e030.USE_PRO_STATUS, (select cd_v_meaning from tb_s020.tb_s020_code010 where cd_tp = 'USE_PRO_STATUS' and cd_v = e030.USE_PRO_STATUS and CATEGORY = '000') USE_PRO_STATUS_nm from tb_s020.tb_s020_event030 e030 inner join event_hierarchy_view vi on vi.event_id = e030.event_id where e030.use_pro_status in ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F') and vi.event_code = #{eventCode} and e030.event_user_id = (select member_id from tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 m010 where m010.hp_no = #{hpNo} and m010.org_id = vi.org_id) group by e030.USE_PRO_STATUS

select count(e030.event_use_id) pay_cnt from tb_s020.tb_s020_member010 m010 inner join tb_s020.tb_s020_event020 e020 on m010.member_id = e020.event_pay_user_id inner join event_hierarchy_view vi on e020.event_id = vi.id_path_priortiy inner join tb_s020.tb_s020_event030 e030 on e030.event_id = vi.event_id and e030.pay_current_step = e020.event_pay_level where vi.event_code = #{eventCode} and m010.hp_no = #{hpNo} and vi.pay_flag = 'Y' and vi.event_final_flag = 'Y' and e030.use_pro_status in ('A', 'B')

SELECT DISTINCT ENT.EVENT_CODE, ENT.EVENT_NM FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_ORG010 ORG INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_MEMBER010 MEM ON ORG.ORG_ID = MEM.ORG_ID INNER JOIN TB_S020.TB_S020_EVENT010 ENT ON ORG.ORG_ID = ENT.ORG_ID WHERE ENT.EVENT_TP = 'D' AND ORG.DATA_END_STATUS IS NULL AND MEM.DATA_END_STATUS IS NULL AND ENT.DATA_END_STATUS IS NULL AND ORG.ORG_NAME = #{orgName} /*단체명*/ AND ORG.CEO_NAME = #{ceoName} /*대표자명*/
